H0.text: Ushuaia, which is now generally accepted as the southernmost city in the world, is in which country. Chile

H1.text: Ushuaia, which is now generally accepted as the southernmost city in the world, is in which country. Australia

H2.text: Ushuaia, which is now generally accepted as the southernmost city in the world, is in which country. New Zealand

H3.text: Ushuaia, which is now generally accepted as the southernmost city in the world, is in which country. Argie

A4.text: Ushuaia is the capital of Tierra del Fuego, Antártida e Islas del Atlántico Sur Province, Argentina.

A5.text: It is the only city accessed from the rest of the country by crossing part of the Andes mountain range, which runs along the southern edge of Tierra del Fuego.
